status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2kb97","text":"Transform the E.Coli BL21DE3 cells with plasmid encoding for GST-mCh-FYVE and plate them on Amp plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cnes","text":"Carry out protein expression in   medium, induce with   IPTG (isopropyl- -d-thiogalactopyranoside) to an OD600 of 0.8 and grow at    .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":108,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7mu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"4BC0AA40C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"200","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4EE82900C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5775CBE0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"58BC0780C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekphc","text":"Harvest the cells by spinning at   for   at   and stock at   until purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6o3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"4500","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D3F6CC0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"614D05C0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"63903F00C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"65C96620C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c16tv","text":"Follow the GST batch purification by Size Exclusion Chromatography.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bp7q","text":"Resuspend the pellets in Lysis Buffer, sonicate for cell lysis and clear at   at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avokh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"16000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C79A4AE0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CB9D83A0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"D1498A60C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66f71","text":"Incubate the supernatant with Glutathione Sepharose 4B (GE Healthcare) at   with gentle shaking for  , apply to a gravity column, and wash extensively with Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"at5k3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DD2AC510C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"DF356220C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mvrb","text":"Elute the protein of interest with Elution Buffer and then apply onto a Superdex 6 column (10/300 Increase) pre-equilibrated in SEC Buffer at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hikj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E516A9B0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dbbv","text":"Pool the peak fractions containing pure protein, snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen, and store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4voqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3fm1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nurm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EDA9F1E0C5F111EBA086B5F8E7A2BA48","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
